summary: Eduardo discovers he has a split personality: a buttoned-up São Paulo executive and beach-loving weekend playboy in Rio de Janeiro called Duca. Unconsciously, he becomes entangled with a woman although he's already engaged to another.
cast: Gregório Duvivier|Dani Calabresa|Clarice Falcão|Marcos Caruso|Júlia Rabello|Rafael Infante|Luis Lobianco|Verônica Debom|Daniel Duncan|Paulo Leal|Zezé Polessa|Carol Portes
title: Desculpe o Transtorno
